entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • compilation warning from gcc regarding misplaced function attributes #74391
  • ubsan discovers out of bounds array access in runtime/src/native/external/libunwind/src/aarch64/Ginit.c #74390
  • Failure in System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread on Debian 10 #74388
  • [NativeAOT] Fail if a ILCompiler package runtime major version is different from target runtime #74387
    8.0.0
  • Support for EnumMemberAttribute in JsonStringEnumConverter #74385
  • clr build fails on Windows ARM64 #74375
  • Assertion failed 'srcInterval->registerType == registerType' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm.Helpers:BitwiseSelect(float,float,float):float' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #74373
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests failures #74370
  • [NativeAOT] Crash during gen1 GC #74355
  • [wasm] 'Undefined symbol: arc4random' building Blazor WASM with libsodium #74352
    8.0.0
  • Mobile workloads are broken in 6.0.401-servicing.22410.12 #74347
  • [wasm] make it possible to enable emscripten assertions #74346
    8.0.0
  • Disabling/filtering query parameters for URIs in HTTP tracing #74340
  • How to run `GC/Stress/Framework/ReliabilityFramework/ReliabilityFramework.sh` on linux ? #74333
    Future
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on Linux arm64 #74332
  • `dotnet build` returns exit code `1` even when the build passes #74328
  • Git error when checking out repo #74327
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileInfo_SymbolicLinks.CreateSymbolicLink_PathToTarget_RelativeToLinkPath #74320
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #74319
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Int128/Int128TestFieldLayout/Int128TestFieldLayout.sh #74318
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Environment variable for summary of JIT info output to console #74084
    Future
  • readytorun\tests\mainv1.csproj TestLoadR2RImageFromByteArray test fails on MacOS and Linux #71507
    7.0.0
  • Seg Fault on Ubuntu 22 (using OpenSSL3); Does not exist on Ubuntu 20 (using OpenSSL 1.1) and Windows #74345
    Future
  • Huge performance drop for fsc.exe/dll #74286
    7.0.0
  • Consider reworking how the x86 emitter handles the 'w' bit #35305
    Future
  • Unsafe code crashes with System.BadImageFormatException when built with latest .NET 7 preview SDK #74306
    7.0.0
  • Add a monotonic clock to the framework #15207
    Future
  • Please provide API and intrinsics to unmanaged memory operations (volatile and atomic operations) to be on parity with managed memory operations #4209
    Future
  • Add Enum.SetFlag and Enum.RemoveFlag to make bitwise flagging easier #14084
    Future
  • Add support for floating point control register manipulation - esp denormal/subnormal flush-to-zero #16018
    Future
  • Strange ASP.NET Core behavior with advanced runtime features #73828
    7.0.0
  • linux ARM64 dotnet7 regression preview 4 to preview 5, 6 and 7 #72645
    7.0.0
  • STJ source generation fails to compile without referencing the STJ package #68810
    Future
  • segfault when calling MarshalNative::GCHandleInternalGet in System.Net.Requests.Tests in rolling CI #69125
    7.0.0
  • Crash in System.Net.WebSockets.Client - Illegal memory access #73621
    7.0.0
  • DependencyInjectionEventSource Memory leak #73832
    7.0.0
  • `DateTime.Now.ToString("r")` incorrectly attributes GMT #74182
    Future
  • Can't get ASP.NET Core app routes to work when hosted via hostfxr in native app #73516
  • Why createdump.exe is needed to do "dotnet publish"? #43716
    Future
  • Redundant similar Relop checks can be eliminated #72509
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Clean up AOT Publishing #72415
    8.0.0
  • Setting PooledConnectionLifetime on HttpClient handlers created using HttpClientFactory #74173
  • LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler should not log unredacted Uri #74339
  • QUIC: On idle connection timeout, errors thrown for streams before connection #73144
  • When will .NET support RFC 7232? #74232
    8.0.0
  • Test failures on runtime-extra-platforms on Android/iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #74076
    8.0.0
  • How to specify a custom default value for `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingDefault` #74326
  • TarReader fails to read tar file with hardlinks; throws System.IO.EndOfStreamException #74309
  • CopyToNanosecondsPresent_LowTempRes #48717
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #74389
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix issues found in recent Int128 ABI change #74386
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 38 RID #74383
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enable Console Logging test in NativeAOT #74381
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [NO MERGE] mono inflate overrides add assertion #74379
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove undefined dereference of `null` #74378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add Fedora 38 RID #74377
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Skip directory symlink recursion on TarFile archive creation #74376
    area-System.IO
  • Update OutOfMemoryException message #74374
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve samples #74371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • support using socks proxy through env vars #74369
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix mono package versions during stabilization #74368
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #74367
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74366
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update workload manifest paths #74364
    area-Meta
  • Reenable class-memaccess warning #74363
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RateLimiting] Handle Timer jitter #74360
    area-System.Threading
  • Allow spaces in octal attributes #74358
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-consider, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74350
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • #50575 default case color behaviour is enabled #74349
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Remove assert from Http3Connection.SendAsync #74348
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable new tests about JMC in Firefox #74344
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm-mt] Fix cross-origin headers when running the browser threads sample test #74342
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add signing infrastructure for diagnostic binaries #74330
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Bump intellisense package version to Preview7 #74356
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a few Tar issues post perf improvements #74338
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update ComponentResources versions and list #74365
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix write barriers in NativeAOT #74325
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump intellisense package version to Preview7 #74354
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Roll forward to the latest 6.0.x builds #74288
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74357
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • fix for SIP regions #74298
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change signature for diagnostic binaries #74322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Change signature for diagnostic binaries #74323
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74362
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 7.0.0
  • Avoid divide by zero in superpmi.py tpdiff #74291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add markdown readme for System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #72772
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix mono package versions during stabilization #74353
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74261
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup current directory tests #74311
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74222
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74230
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74297
    area-Meta
  • Fix some corner cases in TarReader #74329
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #74168
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Apply documentation changes from dotnet-api-docs/pull/8309 #74337
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Use new javascript API in tests and samples #74153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add functional custom JsonConverter tests for Int128/UInt128/Half #74254
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix tar string formatting with more parameters than placeholders #74321
    area-System.IO
  • Update workloads-build.yml #74313
  • fix wasm timestamp test by adding 10M tolerance #74317
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO

Updated

  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #74300
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ignore LoopbackServer exceptions in MaxHeadersLength test #73937
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: finish converting all phases to use common post phase dumps and checks #74308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Draft of optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend forward sub to local fields #73719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Fix per-call stack checks on x86 #74283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 8.0.0
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `lvOverlappingFields` #72356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [WASM] Cross-OS native compilation is not supported #1961

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_NULLCHECK #1871

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines Tests to Indicate Unexpected Files #27346
  • Certain files should be optional when publishing app as self-contained #27336
  • dotnet format fails to locate msbuild #27332
  • [Bug] Installed Custom Sdks in DOTNET_ROOT/packs now cant be located for loading in Visual Studio. #27329
  • Suddenly "dotnet watch" runs in "Production" environment #27341

Closed

  • Not getting the output code that I expected: 'dotnet new console' #27323
  • The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: NotSignatureValid #25582

PullRequests

Created

  • Add wasm-tools-net6 to the list of workloads that will pull in netweb in VS. #27347
    Area-VS
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1959815 #27345
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update AO test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • dotnet new tests refactoring #27333
    area: dotnet new
  • added and altered readme files after moving `dotnet new` and templates #27330
    Area-Templates, area: dotnet new
  • Add solution filter for template engine #27328
    Area-Infrastructure, area: dotnet new

Merged

  • dotnet new: switched telemetry to use `TelemetryEventEntry` #27223
    area: dotnet new
  • Switch localization to 7.0.1xx release branch #27296
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use SymbolComparer in MembersMustExist rule #27321
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum msbuild for RC2 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only reference the needed packages #27322
    Area-ApiCompat
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Remove js-module-crypto handling in the SDK #27303
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1958018 #27252
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect CS8170 when calling [UnscopedRef] method to assign to a fixed local #63529
  • Missing CS8166 when accessing [UnscopedRef] property to assing to an unscoped local #63526
  • Incorrect CS8166 when calling [UnscopedRef] method to assing to a scoped local #63524

Closed

  • Mark parameter from metadata with ScopedRefAttribute and UnscopedRefAttribute as invalid #63070
    17.4
  • Report error for `[UnscopedRef] scoped` parameter #63057
    17.4
  • Call to DeconstructionInfo.Nested causes System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'UncommonData' to type 'DeconstructionUncommonData'. #61332
    17.4
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString misses `where T : default` constrains for overridden method #63512
    C# 12.0
  • Unclear which Recommender method is to be used #63521
  • GetTypeInfo doesn't work correctly on tuples #54437
    Compiler.Next
  • We might want to revisit SemanticModel behavior around type syntax for a DeclarationExpression based on ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #17462
    Compiler.Next
  • missing CS4014 warning when calling async func parameter #63436
  • False warning of property hiding inherited method member #63509
  • NullReferenceException from implicit cast of null-conditional member access expression #63516
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString produces incorrect list of inherited generic classes #63511
  • source generator IncrementalValuesProvider caching lost on add/remove #63514
  • partial class source generator error #63513
  • Clarification on Supported use of RegisterForPostInitialization #63501

PullRequests

Created

  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extract Base Record Pass 1 #63528
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the LSIF indexer's ability to load MSBuild projects and solutions #63527
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Add an Integration test to guard the case when rename UI could freeze #63520
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor #63519
    Area-IDE
  • CSharp.DeclarationTable – avoid realizing lazy roots during add/remove operations. #63517
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle nested non-deconstruction conversions in DeconstructionInfo #63435
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Skip integration tests on PRs for compiler-only changes #63523
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not nominate project for restore #63518
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Constructor ordering, defaults, and overloads #63371
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Do symbol mapping in Go To Def #63439
    Area-IDE
  • Editorconfig valueholder #63483
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Cherry-pick 62946 to 17.3 #63495
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid eagerly realizing the declaration table #59392
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RateLimitingMiddleware throws TaskCanceledException #43473
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor wasm - compiles successful .net 6 #43471
  • Using different Authentication Scheme for JWT tokens does not work #43467
  • EFCore + LazyLoadingProxies + Localization + Html.DisplayNameForModel() == NotSupportedException: The invoked member is not supported in a dynamic asm #43466
  • ApiExplorer does not respect [FromQuery.Name] for complex parameter types #43464
  • IDE0060 error when building in source-build #43462
  • CA1825 error when building in source-build #43461
  • Improve population of application parts when there's no entry-point assembly #43460
  • [SignalR] Precision on specifications for MessagePack #43455
  • Application.DispatcherUnhandledException alternative in Blazor #43454
    Backlog
  • Securing a SPA by Identityserver 6 before first load in .NET 6 #43452
  • Tilde ~ in HTML tag path segments of Razor pages breaks hot reload #43450
    .NET 8 Planning
  • I am getting a System.NullReferenceError when I am using a .NET MAUI Blazor app #43448
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #43447
  • Annotate RazorPageGenerator for nullability #43446
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Annotate Razor for nullability #43445
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures for nullability #43444
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers for nullability #43443
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • ASPNETCORE_Environment overrides cmd parameter #17963
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebTransport API #42490
    7.0-rc1
  • Content not being posted to textarea ASP.NET Core #43301
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_nodejs #43430
  • Add AllowLineTerminator option in KestrelServerOptions #43252
    7.0-rc1
  • Accessing `session` within another controller - ASP.NET Core 6 Web API #43288
  • Blazor Component doesn't re-render after unhandled exception in event handler #43433
  • Calling Blazor functions from javascript does not work as expected #43367
  • Update ASP.NET Core to use C# 8's nullable reference types #5680
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Testing QuickGrid and examples do not work. #43440
  • Profile HTTP/2 and identify hotspots #13745
    Backlog
  • HTTP/3: Handle non-peer abort with connection #42965
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Make skipComponentGovernanceDetection a variable #43477
    area-infrastructure
  • Update MessagePack-CSharp #43476
    area-blazor, tell-mode
  • Update MessagePack-CSharp #43474
  • CanCachePolicy->AllowsCachingPolicies #43469
    area-security
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43463
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7274ec1` to `c0e032e` #43458
    area-infrastructure
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
  • Remove the double dispatch on Windows for IO #43449
    area-runtime
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [release/7.0-rc1] Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger experimental #43384
    area-grpc
  • [release/7.0] Stop overriding MicrosoftNetCompilersToolsetVersion #43472
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Skip component governance in public builds #43470
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • WebTransport interfaces require preview features #43419
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9044834` to `257f68f` #43457
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Retry VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence test #43410
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, blog-candidate, 7.0-rc1
  • Retry a few tests #43422
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Strip Content-Length: 0 from responses that should not have a Content-Length #43417
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1959175 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't throw TaskCanceledException in RateLimitingMiddleware #43320
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve DisplayActionSheet #9591
  • Crash when using a ListView in a RelativeLayout #9590
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on Android, but on Windows #9587
  • VerticalStackLayout Spacing with hidden children #9586
  • IsEnabled currently doesn't do anything when set on a ContextMenu #9583
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Review guidance for ToolTips and accessibility #9582
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] Type x:String not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #9580
  • [Windows] HTML select options are not properly displayed in BlazorWebView #9579
  • Different SplashScreen for Light and Dark Modes #9578
    Backlog
  • Publish MAUI Project with reference iOS #9576
  • Buttons in some pages of a TabbedPage don't grow and instead clip their content #9575
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Package signature validation failed" #9573

Closed

  • The name property of an element should not contain class names like 'Microsoft.*.*' or 'Windows.*.*' as these are not usually information. #9066
    .NET 7
  • ResourceDictionary loaded from rd.xaml does not expose any entries #9526
    .NET 7
  • Windows TitleBar button hover color not behaving as expected and position alignment is off when maximimized #9436
  • Navigating to Page which is using DI with DataTemplate causes error #9565
  • App.Close | App.Terminate | App.Restart #9562
  • [Tracking] Consider renaming "💡help wanted" and "💡good first issue" labels #9559
  • FlexLayout AlignContent SpaceAround #9569
  • Custom controls existing in XAML at launch time are not updated via HotReload (.NET MAUI) #8948
    6.0-sr5
  • Can not run project in MacOS #9568
  • Unable to convert instance of type 'Java.Net.URLConnectionInvoker' to type 'Java.Net.HttpURLConnection'. #9571

PullRequests

Created

  • Secondary ButtonMask #9589
  • Updating WinSdkBuildTools to 10.0.22621.1 #9588
    community ✨, 7.0-rc1
  • [Windows] Notify changes in Picker ItemsSource #9584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 to 7.0.0-preview1.22419.4 #9577
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix typo in ScrollToRequest.cs #9574
    community ✨
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    community ✨

Merged

  • [C] Align RD.Keys and Values with Count behavior #9581
  • Propagate semantic properties from FlyoutItem #9270
  • Get the Mac Catalyst device tests running #9534
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing
  • Fix GC issues and cancel button visibility #9557
    area/a11y, control-button
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22403.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 #9545
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9560
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9508
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0-rc1
  • Set the link mode to None when using interpreter #8450
    7.0-rc1
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] Fix updating Border Background using VisualStateManager #9553
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove this method and let different instances of ColumnExpression exist #28838
  • Update-Database -context [contextname] not working with User Secrets #28837
  • Query: Change JsonQueryExpression.Path to be a List<PathSegment> #28836
  • Allow configuration of JSON serialization for a given property in the model #28835
    Backlog
  • Generate warning for single query mode when loading collection and JSON column on parent/outer #28831
    Backlog
  • Very inefficient SQL generated for simple table-split query since 3.0. #28829
  • API for raw JSONPATH queries #28824
    Backlog
  • ExecuteUpdate with cross apply produces invalid SQL #28823
  • The instance of entity type cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value for { 'ID'} is already being tracked. #28822

Closed

  • Typo in aka.ms link #28771
    7.0.0
  • In-Memory database not persisted between multiple DbContexts #28778
  • Not generating DbContextModelSnapshot #28725
  • Scaffolding Database with default AspNetCore Identity tables. #28701
  • Excluding queries from compiled query cache #28689
  • User-defined function mapping not working when resolving context through dependency injection. #28668
  • Way to get seeds from sql file? #28792

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge rc1 to release/7.0 #28839
  • ExecuteUpdate: Correctly identify when we need to cause a subquery join #28834

Merged

  • Query: Fix for query fails with JSON columns and Include collection #28832
    tell-mode
  • Query: API review changes #28833
    tell-mode
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.10 to 8.0.11 #28828
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.29.0 to 3.30.0 #28827
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Remove `EFCore.Relational.Tests` dependency. #28830
    tell-mode
  • addressing final API review feedback for json columns #28820
    tell-mode

Updated

  • Query: Update formatting of Update command #28797
